attributes.title: this app is horrible 😾🙀😤💕

Have to agree on the others with this it’s a bad app. I mean the gameplay is  just plain cheap and a waste of time sorry. It could be fun in some add some memes or some thing. Make the over all theme better. This was like a fifth grade project on how to get something to appear on the iPhone as an app

attributes.title: Do not get it
attributes.review: It keeps crashing my phone when I open it and it won’t even load! Like, jeez Trump, I knew you couldn’t run America but wow. You can’t even perfect your own app? No offense but this is why I would rather be a communist country than let you act like your our leader. Smh

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I tried to get this app so i can support OUR president but it is just so wildly horrible i had to delete it. It kept crashing my phone, exiting out for no reason, the interface is not friendly at all, and overall it’s just an awful app

attributes.title: Not worth it at alll
attributes.review: It was taking such a long time to download (4 hours) and it was constantly glitching. It was switching me over to random inappropriate websites. The process was just SOO not worth it. There were inappropriate advertisements as well. To sum it up, this app is disgusting and should be removed!

attributes.title: Smh
attributes.review: I opened the app and was immediately suffocated with the worst most ugly picture I could imagine: out President smiling. I went to tech support to get this problem fixed and was ruthlessly dragged by the worker who said I was a fat tub of lard who just sits around all day. I am hurt. I can’t even describe how much I cried. I’m about to sue.

attributes.title: this app is TERRIBLE😡😡
attributes.review: i downloaded the app and automatically popped up with the racist, homophobic, transphobic, islamphobic, and misogynistic president!😡this is absolutely ridiculous i downloaded this app to see bernie sanders yet i see trump. 1/5 is the nicest i could be. it took so long to even open and made me waste my phone battery !

attributes.title: Save TikTok !!!!!
attributes.review: Honestly I just don’t see why there is a reason to remove a app that a lot people use like tiktok wut do u want people to do eat snacks all day instead were something could just see a around and watching or making them like really that what harm is it doing to us

attributes.title: Disappointing
attributes.review: When I opened this app I thought I would get free Chicken nuggets but no when I first I saw this orange rat and I got scared and it said I know where you live and it knew I wasn’t a trump supporter and this app is supposed to get me chicken nuggets like what the heck I’m suing and that’s why I give it a one star review and deleted this app

attributes.title: Great app
attributes.review: Everyone trying to delete it is dumb because  that is not going to work. Trump 2020!
